title: Monday Post Show (03-14-22)
itunes:title: Monday Post Show (03-14-22)
description:
We start with Amy who is trying to create a new account for Draft Kings but her name is already taken. Bobby talks about a man who has spent his life living on cruise ships and how the show has been approached to do a cruise promotion. We find out if Raymundo ended up staying at a listener’s ‘mansion’ in Florida. Morgan reviews Seeing Red and Peacemaker that she watched over the weekend because she didn’t want to use gas and go places. Eddie talks about writing a song that’s on John Daly's new album. Amy stayed with her psychic cousin over the weekend in Austin, TX and how she experiences spirits. And in true post show fashion…we get into a big discussion about time travel, aliens and the future.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
